subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira and the knuckleball pitcher R. A. Dickey, with the Blue Jays, are on the United States team for the World Baseball Classic.
snippet: Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira and the knuckleball pitcher R. A. Dickey, with the Blue Jays, are on the United States team for the World Baseball Classic.
